About Me

I was born and raised in Pakistan. I spent most of my life in a rural village. Then for my undergrad degree I moved to Hong Kong. I've attached one picture that I took in Pakistan and one that I took in Hong Kong (I'm sure you'll able to tell which one is which üôÇ).
